QuestData.Title: Torture the Torturer
QuestData.Description: Enough! I want you to put an end to the torture of my people!$B$BThe Onslaught's torturer, Alphonse, has been bleeding information out of everyone that gets caught by those fiends! I need to know what they know.$B$BMy sources tell me that he has set up shop in the basement of their barracks, which is right next to the smithy.$B$BI'll loan you my personal branding iron to see to it that the job is done right.$B$BFind him and get that information.
QuestData.LogDescription: High Executor Wroth at Venomspite wants you to use the branding iron 5 times on Torturer Alphonse to get the information out of him. After that, kill him.
QuestData.CompletionText: What news do you bring? Success, no doubt?
QuestData.RewardText: They knew all of that? And who the hell is this Grand Admiral Westwind that he spoke of?!$B$B<The high executor grumbles to himself about hating surprises.>$B$BBetter that we know than have to guess. I hope that you left your... er, my mark.
